attributes.action: Change the law so that anyone who is drunk and disorderly has to pay the costs for police time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anyone who is so drunk that they require police assistance, a night in a cell, ambulance, paramedics etc, should be charged accordingly.  If they are unable to pay then they should have an attachment of earnings served. How about 500 for police time, 1500 for police +ambulance and 250 for a night in a cell?
